name: Edamame Roasted Garlic Hummus
author: Zhora Autumn
summary: The addition of roasted garlic and cilantro really makes this dish shine. Serve with baked pita chips.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or more as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Trim about 1/4 inch off the top of the garlic bulb, to expose the cloves; drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil and wrap in aluminum foil
Bake in the preheated oven until soft, about 1 hour
Let cool until easily handled, about 10 minutes
Squeeze roasted garlic cloves into a food processor
Add 1 tablespoon olive oil, edamame, cilantro, tahini, lemon juice, and salt
Process until smooth, adding more oil if needed, about 3 minutes
Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with smoked paprika
